DOC.brief_title: Registry Patients With Wilms ' Tumor Suppressor Gene 1 ( WT1 ) Mutation Associated Diseases
DOC.detailed_description: The Wilms ' tumor suppressor gene 1 ( WT1 ) encode transcription factor play important role urogenital development . Patients carry WT1 germline mutation show symptom like proteinuria , Wilms tumor , genital malformation kidney failure , usually occur early childhood . Milder variant possible classification one three rare syndromes associate WT1 mutation ( Denys-Drash syndrome , Frasier syndrome WAGR syndrome ) always possible . In registry collect detailed clinical data affect individual establish genotype-phenotype correlation great goal optimize patient care .
